fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.plugins.devs.connections

Class SimulationManagementOutboundPort

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractPort
            • fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.AbstractOutboundPort
              • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.plugins.devs.connections.SimulationManagementOutboundPort
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SimulationManagementCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.OutboundPortI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.PortI, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class SimulationManagementOutboundPort
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.AbstractOutboundPort
implements SimulationManagementCI
    The class SimulatorPluginManagementOutboundPort implements the outbound port for the required interface SimulatorPluginManagementCI.

    Description

    Black-box Invariant

     invariant        true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2018-06-01

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

      • setSimulationRunParameters

        public void setSimulationRunParameters(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> simParams)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: SimulationManagementCI
        set the simulation parameters for a simulation run.

        Description

        This method is the same as fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.plugins.devs.interfaces.ModelCI#setSimulationRunParameters(java.util.Map). It could be factored out in a separate interface, but maybe a too complicated solution for just one method.

        Contract

         pre     simParams != null && simParams.size() > 0
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Specified by:
        setSimulationRunParameters in interface SimulationManagementCI
        Parameters:
        simParams - map from parameters names to their values.
        Throws:
        fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.exceptions.MissingRunParameterException - if an expected run parameter does not appear in simParams (including simParams being null).
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
        See Also:
        SimulationManagementCI.setSimulationRunParameters(java.util.Map)

      • startRTSimulation

        public void startRTSimulation(long realTimeOfStart,
                              double simulationStartTime,
                              double simulationDuration)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: SimulationManagementCI
        at real time realTimeStart, start a real time collaborative simulation with the simulation clock stating at startTime and lasting simulatedTimeDuration.

        Contract

         pre     realTimeStart > System.currentTimeMillis()
 pre     realTimeStart < Long.MAX_VALUE
 pre     simulationStartTime >= 0.0
 pre     simulationStartTime  < Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY
 pre     simulationDuration > 0
 pre     simulationDuration <= Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY
 pre     isRTSchedulerSet()
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Specified by:
        startRTSimulation in interface SimulationManagementCI
        Parameters:
        realTimeOfStart - time of start for the simulation, in real time, synchronising all simulation engines.
        simulationStartTime - time at which the simulation starts interpreted in the model simulation time.
        simulationDuration - duration of the simulation interpreted in the model simulation time.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
        See Also:
        SimulationManagementCI.startRTSimulation(long, double, double)
